From Calicut Railway Station (22 kms)

By Bus

Take a 10minute walk or get a rickshaw for a fare of INR12 to Palayam bus stand and board a bus to REC / NIT Calicut

By Rickshaw
Get a rickshaw from the Railway Station to NIT Calicut for a fare of INR 300
By Taxi
You may get a taxi from the railway station to NIT Calicut for a fare of INR 450.

From Calicut Airport

Calicut Airport is located at Karipur, 27 Kms south-east of the city and it is 45 kms from NIT Calicut. You can reach NIT Calicut by taxi from the Calicut Airport and the taxi fare is approximately INR 800.
